casebody.data:
Demetrio Navarro RAMIREZ, Sandra Hoyle, and Maria Luisa Navarro Perez, Co-Administrators of the Estate of Brian Navarro Perez, and Demetrio and Maria Navarro Ramirez, Individually
v.
James C. LITTLE, M.D. No. 187P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Eric P. Handler, Winston-Salem, for Ramirez, et al. Kenneth L. Jones, Greensboro, for James C. Little, M.D.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of April 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
